name: slimness

approving (in people) the quality of being attractively thin: Millions of people are walking regularly for fitness, slimness, and health. The slimness of her waist is emphasized by a shiny belt.
the quality of being very small in size or amount: The slimness of this volume is misleading: the nine stories require careful reading. See
slim

Emily did see slimness as having health benefits, but she wanted to lose weight for cosmetic reasons.This phone cover seems to offer best combination of protection and slimness.He held the knife towards her so she could see its slimness and length and glittering sharpness.
